text: Joseph Emmanuel Benjamin (2 February 1961 - 8 March 2021) was a St Kitts-born English cricketer. He played in one Test and two ODIs from 1994 to 1995. His single Test match appearance for England came in 1994. After retiring as a player, Benjamin was a cricket coach. Benjamin died on 8 March 2021 after suffering a heart attack in Surrey, England at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English and Welsh cricketers Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Saint Kitts and Nevis people
title: Joey Benjamin
